TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit HttpRequestBase extends System.Object

summary.span: 做為類別的基底類別，這些類別可讓 ASP.NET 讀取用戶端在 Web 要求期間傳送的 HTTP 值。

span.span: Serves as the base class for classes that enable ASP.NET to read the HTTP values sent by a client during a Web request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是抽象類別，其中包含相同的成員類別。The class is an abstract class that contains the same members as the class. 類別可讓您建立衍生的類別，它就像是類別，但您可以自訂，且該工作外的 ASP.NET 管線。The class enables you to create derived classes that are like the class, but that you can customize and that work outside the ASP.NET pipeline. 當您執行單元測試時，您通常會使用衍生的類別來實作自訂行為符合您所測試的案例中的成員。When you perform unit testing, you typically use a derived class to implement members that have customized behavior that fulfills the scenario that you are testing. 類別衍生自 類別。The class derives from the class. 類別可做為包裝函式類別。The class serves as a wrapper for the class. 在執行階段，您通常使用的執行個體類別叫用的成員物件。At run time, you typically use an instance of the class to invoke members of the object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化這個類別，以供繼承的類別執行個體使用。

span.span: Initializes the class for use by an inherited class instance.

summary.span: 這個建構函式只能由繼承的類別呼叫。

span.span: This constructor can only be called by an inherited class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Abort() cil managed
abstract member Abort : unit -> unit override this.Abort : unit -> unit

summary.span: 強制終止造成任何待處理 I/O 失敗的基礎 TCP 連線。

span.span: Forcibly terminates the underlying TCP connection, causing any outstanding I/O to fail.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法是安全執行緒。This method is thread-safe. 任何執行緒可以呼叫它在任何時間。Any thread may call it at any time.

Always.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得目前要求的虛擬路徑。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the virtual path of the current request.

value.span: 目前執行之網頁處理常式的虛擬路徑。

span.span: The virtual path of the page handler that is currently executing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回目前執行的網頁處理常式的檔案路徑。The property returns the file path of the currently executing page handler. 當您將要求重新導向使用方法或方法，屬性傳回的路徑，重新導向的頁面 （子頁面）。When you redirect a request using either the method or the method, the property returns the path of the page that you are redirecting to (the child page). 不過，當用戶端重新導向至另一個頁面上，屬性傳回至原始網頁的路徑。However, when the client is redirected to another page, the property returns the path to the original page.

span.span: Always.

param.name: buffer
param.span: 包含要求實體資料的陣列。

span.span: An array that contains the request entity data.

param.name: offset
param.span: buffer 中以零為起始的位置，即要開始儲存要求實體資料的位置。

span.span: The zero-based position in buffer at which to begin storing the request entity data.

param.name: count
param.span: 要讀入 buffer 陣列的位元組數目。

span.span: The number of bytes to read into the buffer array.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中實作時，將 HTTP 要求實體內容的複本及該要求實體物件的相關資訊提供給 IIS。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, provides IIS with a copy of the HTTP request entity body and with information about the request entity object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ValidateInput() cil managed
abstract member ValidateInput : unit -> unit override this.ValidateInput : unit -> unit

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，會對透過 、 和 屬性存取的集合進行驗證。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, causes validation to occur for the collections that are accessed through the , , and properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別使用的輸入的驗證旗標來判斷是否要執行驗證，對要求的集合，可以透過存取， ，和屬性。The class uses input validation flags to determine whether to perform validation on the request collections that are accessed through the , , and properties. 方法設定這些旗標，因此，當`get`存取子， ，或叫用屬性，則會執行輸入的驗證。The method sets these flags so that when the `get` accessors of the , , or properties are invoked, input validation is performed. 驗證的運作方式是檢查所有的輸入的資料的硬式編碼有潛在危險的資料清單。Validation works by checking all input data against a hard-coded list of potentially dangerous data.

span.span: Always.
